channel.title: The Poetry Extension
channel.description: The Poetry Extension. Bringing poets and dancers from Canada, the UK, Ireland, and the US together, one face-melting gig at a time.

item.title: Rebecca Goss
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for October, Rebecca Goss.

item.title: Airea D. Matthews
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for September, Airea D. Matthews.

item.title: Clare Pollard
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for August, Clare Pollard.

item.title: Luke Kennard
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for July, Luke Kennard.

item.title: Karen McCarthy Woolf
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for June, Karen McCarthy Woolf.

item.title: Pascale Petit
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for May, Pascale Petit.

item.title: Karolina Kuras
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews former dancer and ballet photographer, Karolina Kuras.

item.title: Rachael Allen
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, conducts an interview with our ‘Poet of the Month’ for January, Rachael Allen.

item.title: Anisa Tejpar
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Dancer of the Month’ for January, Anisa Tejpar.
